home.title: Hi, I'ts Rocio Garcia Lofrano
home.subtitle: I'm Full Stack Developer.
home.p: Based in Buenos Aires, Argentina. Passionate about code and learning new things. Welcome to my portfolio! ❤

about.p_1: I started my studies in 2021, at the SoyHenry Bootcamp where I acquired more than 800 hours of intensive learning doing individual and group projects. I decided then that this was the world in which I wanted to develop professionally. Today I continue to train professionally in the Bootcamp of Argentina Program 4.0.
about.p_2: Among my main Soft Skills are my good management of communication, and assertiveness in problem solving, teamwork but also my independence.
about.p_3: Today, I feel much more comfortable working as a Frontend, since I stand out for my creativity, attention to detail and a critical eye, which increases my curiosity and love for this huge world.
